definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The burn-out accident occurred several times in operation of dry type hollow shunt reactor.
sentences.chinese: 干式空心并联电抗器在运行中曾发生多起烧损事故。

sentences.english: The application of new-type reactor in the electric power system is expounded.
sentences.chinese: 详述了新型电抗器在电力系统中的应用。

sentences.english: Air-core power reactor has been important equipment in power system at the present time.
sentences.chinese: 空心电力电抗器目前已经成为电力系统中的重要设备。

sentences.english: The study on simulation model of 12-pulse transformation rectifier with equilibrium reactor was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了带均衡电抗器的12脉波变压整流器仿真模型。

sentences.english: Phaseshifting reactor is a new method for converter power supply systems harmonic suppression.
sentences.chinese: 移相电抗器是变流器供电系统谐波抑制的一种新方法。

definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
